author: Willy
content:
Just because the moon moves away doesnt make the moon new. It is still just a moon. Just now there is more hype about something that has existed for 5 million years. Tomorrow it will be a moon. It will be a moon in a year. AND it will still be the same moon. The today generation that feels everything must have a change is willing to look at the king whom has no clothes, and say he has something he doesnt. He is still stark naked and just a moon. Nothing new no matter how you want to gloss it over. It is still

the moon.

author: Phil
content:
Willy,

Not really the same Moon, it is slowly moving away from Earth every year.

For the last few billion years the Moon’s gravity has been raising tides in Earth’s oceans which the fast spinning Earth attempts to drag ahead of the sluggishly orbiting Moon. The result is that the Moon is being pushed away from Earth by 1.6 inches (4 centimeters) per year and our planet’s rotation is slowing.Jan 22, 2007
Earth’s Moon Destined to Disintegrate – Space.com
http://www.space.com/3373-earth-moon-destined-disintegrate.html

Yet it is still a moon. The same moon the Earth has had since man started measuring time. The moon has passed many a time through the earths shadow before. It is nothing new. Only the hype that was put into it has changed.
